summary: This is an email from attorney Joseph DiPiero at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP, transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank to the SDNY in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. It includes a cover letter and an updated production index.

persons.name: Joseph DiPiero
persons.context: Attorney from Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP who sent the email transmitting Deutsche Bank's document production to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The SDNY issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, likely as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production to SDNY
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its attorneys, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in response to the July 2019 subpoena.

locations: 2001 K Street N.W., Washington, DC 20006 (Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP office)
keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was subpoenaed by the SDNY on July 11, 2019, as part of the Epstein investigation.
On December 13, 2019, Deutsche Bank's legal counsel submitted an additional production of documents in response to that subpoena.
The law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP represented Deutsche Bank in this matter.
The communication confirms ongoing investigative activity by the SDNY into financial aspects related to Jeffrey Epstein in late 2019.
